title: UiPath Business Analyst
description:
Job Title :: UiPath Business Analyst

Location :: Bengaluru India (Hybrid – 2-3 days onsite in a week)

Seniority :: Mid level (Minimum 5+ years of relevant experience) & Senior level (Minimum 7+ years of relevant experience)

Must have Insurance domain experience




Job Description:

We are seeking an experienced UiPath Business Analyst to join our team. The successful candidate will work closely with business stakeholders to understand and analyze requirements, gather insights, and provide solutions for automating business processes using UiPath Robotic Process Automation (RPA) technology. The role will involve evaluating current processes, identifying automation opportunities, and collaborating with UiPath developers to design, develop, and implement effective RPA solutions.




Responsibilities:

Work closely with business stakeholders to capture and analyze business requirements and process flows for automation initiatives.
Translate business requirements into technical specifications, working closely with the UiPath development team to design effective automation solutions.
Hands-on experience with UiPath Studio, Orchestrator, and other UiPath tools is highly desirable.
Solid understanding of business process modeling, process automation, and system integrations.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to interact effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Experience with Agile methodologies and project management tools (e.g., JIRA, Confluence).
Strong documentation and requirements gathering skills.
Knowledge of process improvement methodologies such as Lean, Six Sigma, or similar is a plus.




Preferred Skills:

UiPath RPA certifications (e.g., UiPath Certified RPA Business Analyst).
Experience with process mining tools.
Knowledge of other RPA tools or automation frameworks.
Familiarity with cloud environments and integrations.
